features: DERMATOLOGICALLY APPROVED SKIN TONER - for dry and combination skin. Gentle, alcohol-free hydrating toner for face, that hydrates as it exfoliates for clearer, brighter and softer skin that never feels tight

SKIN BARRIER PROTECTING CERAMIDE and HYALURONIC ACID COMPLEX - lock in moisture after a face wash with this face toner, formulated with Hyaluronic Acid + Ceramides for all day hydration that strengthens your skin’s natural barrier
CLINICALLY PROVEN TO HELP PREVENT BREAKOUTS - clarifying skincare blend of gently exfoliating Mandelic Acid + Niacinamide, helps remove excess sebum, dirt and impurities
POLLUTION PROTECTION - infused with Vitamin E and Vitamin C, this face toner for women and men protects the skin from environmental aggressors

100% VEGAN and CRUELTY FREE - kind to both your skin and the planet, this cruelty-free facial toner is made of the highest-quality vegan ingredients, is alcohol-free and fragrance-free, with packaging made from recycled materials, and is carbon neutral
body.description: Coats Gentle Hydrating Toning Milk For smooth, plump skin that never feels tight or stripped. This alcohol-free, milky toner hydrates and protects as it exfoliates. Formulated with Mandelic Acid, Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, Niacinamide, and Ceramides to help prevent future breakouts, shield the skin from environmental aggressors, and is clinically proven to protect the skin moisture barrier for clear, glowing skin and all-day hydration. Coats’ face toner is designed to Protect & Prevent skincare damage. This simple skin toner is Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Paraben Free, SLS free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Winter!
reviews.reviewText: I've been trying to find an alternative to Laneige's cream toner for YEARS and I finally found a better formula with Coats' toning milk! The formula is definitely thicker, almost like a moisturizer, but a little definitely goes a long way and a bonus, it's vegan and cruelty-free which I appreciate. Can't recommend this enough for dry and dehydrated skin types, especially during the winter!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Made me break out
reviews.reviewText: Wanted to love it! But it definitely made me break out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Has a weird smell, and didn’t do anything for my skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Oh my gosh!This is more than a toner! The moment I placed it on my skin, I knew I had found thee right one! At last! A brand I’d been using for over a 10 years, and would tone my face cheeks nicely, changed their ingredients! And stopped working for my skin!! I was soooo annoyed! I have sensitive skin. I went through a few other toners from other brands, with bad reactions, so went without toning my face for months!! Boooo! That had me anxious!I had my eye on this particular product for a while, but the price had me on pause (economic crisis..hellooooo)… BUT! Milk ? Hmmm. Let’s try something new. Let’s break the bank… BINGO!Face smooth straight away. Face glowing straight away. Skin looking like new skin cells has just taken over. I noticed an immediate reaction in my skin from day 1! I looked …. RENEWED! REFRESHED!It’s now been a few weeks, and my cheeks are starting to form their list tone again. Woohoo. And I do have good skin in general, but wow, so many compliments on my skin these days! Or “you look well” (😅) But I did change my face cream too… lol. May write a review on that lol.Bottom line, this product is worth every penny and definitely one I cannot live without! Looks like it’ll be the next contender for the next 10 years or so! Hopefully it will still be around and NOT CHANGE its ingredients! If it’s not broken, don’t fix it!I was not paid to write this review. This is my honest review, thoughts, and opinions :)Happy shopping everybody!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this toner! It helps me a lot with my acne and pigmentation. This is part of my holy grail. However, I don’t use it on my neck as the ingredients quite strong for it. My face loving it instead! Don’t forget to use coats moisturiser too! And always use sunscreen!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 6, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This is quite different from most toners I have tried in that it has a milky texture which must be why it is called toning milk! Seriously though, the texture looks and feels more like a cleanser. The ingredients include Vitamin E, Vitamin A, Mandelic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid, Niacinamide and Ceramides and It is made for dry and combination skin. It is alcohol free, fragrance free, parabens free, vegan and cruelty free too.The packaging is not exactly luxe (I am a sucker for nice packaging!) but it is perfectly okay. As I said the texture is a bit different but I liked that it really gets rid of all traces of cleanser and makes my skin feel mattified and ready for the next skincare step. I am not particularly keen on the fragrance which smells a bit clinical but it soon dissipates. I cannot comment on the price, as it is currently unavailable, but it’s quite a good toner, probably not my favourite, but it does the job well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Clean fresh easy to apply,good value for me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 26, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I have combination oily skin that gets dry sometimes so I don't have an issue using products meant for dry skin and have not had issues with this toning milk feeling too heavy.The product is easy to work into the skin and it is quite thin so you only need a little bit to cover the whole face.I can feel a little bit of tingling when applying this toning milk but it is not too uncomfortable and doesn't last long.Results:I have been using it in combination with their Triple Moisture Water cream and these 2 products have really been healing my skin from acne scarring and I also get a lot less breakouts. The pores look smaller, I have less post acne pigmentation and my skin overall looks much healthier. If I happen to have picked my face these 2 products have a really healing effect and the next day my skin is not irritated anymore.Highly recommend this even if you have oily and problematic skin.
